message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.CY 

This paper is about improving spoken language understanding (SLU) systems for customer care calls. It involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques such as logistic regression, n-grams, and language models. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper also involves machine learning (ML) techniques such as semi-supervised learning, TF-IDF, and embedding vectors, which are covered in sub-categories cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with data processing and analysis, which could fall under sub-category cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing). Finally, the paper is related to human-computer interaction (HCI) and customer service, which could be covered in sub-category cs.CY (Computers and Society).
